snippet.title: Halo CE MCC Mods: Airlock FireFight! (Download Today!)
snippet.description:
●Download Here: https://www.nexusmods.com/halothemasterchiefcollection/mods/305/
Just drop the Halo 1 folder into the directory before the Normal Halo 1 folder your game is installed in. After that it should prompt you to replace the map and fmeta file. If you are okay with this, and have your maps backed up, press Overwrite, and Play!
────────────────────────────────────────
● This mod was ported, edited, and recreated by Corbman and S3anyBoy. 
►This mod includes weapons from CMT, the Authors of SPV3. 
Find some of their work here: https://haloce3.com/downloads/singleplayer/original-singleplayer/spv3-1/
►We currently have to use the Textures from the Map we are replacing to get mods to play correctly, otherwise there will be No Textures. We did the best we could to make the map look good as the original, and play even better. What's new with this map besides various weapons we ported from CMT, is found in the video above, but here is a brief list below:
►►Many new Weapons added including the BR, H3 magnum, Silenced SMG, Spartan Laser, Shotgun, Sniper, and even something special. 
►►We moved the health system and added Lives to make it on par with the other firefight mods coming out soon. 
►►All the enemies are vanilla bipeds from Halo 1 but since the POA doesn't have all variants, some of them lack textures as well.
►►Johnson is now here with a lovely speech you may remember!
►►Dialogue was added from Cortana, and Keys as well. 
►►The game was also re balanced to our liking, we hope you agree with the changes.
►►Most the textures I layed down are similar or the same to the ones from the original map, but many are not. We did the best we can. 
►►The lightmap also did not work, but we like the new appearance it brought the map! 
►►►Thanks for watching, and I hope you enjoy the mod

● ● This mod was originally created by doompig444 on Halo Ce. Here is the link: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=5170 ● ● 

If you are interested in porting more Halo Maps for yourself then Feel free to Follow this Tutorial created by S3anyBoy!
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1H_E7y04Nhsn8z_TKHS1mQdrUZfmJu1gMMaF9efxQ5vI/edit#
────────────────────────────────────────
● Please follow us on our Social networks!

 ►Like our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/GameTuts

 ► ►Support Us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=25835859

────────────────────────────────────────
